## Description {#details}

High level: this is an iterator for llvm.dbg.assign intrinsics.

Implementation details: this is a wrapper around <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>&#39;s <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> iterator that dereferences to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgassignintrinsic">DbgAssignIntrinsic</a> ptr rather than a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> ptr.

Definition at line 213 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfo-h">DebugInfo.h</a>.
